output_list.criticism: The totalSupply function returns an incorrect value due to an integer overflow in the calculation of the total supply.
The transfer function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to.balance due to a lack of proper validation.
The transferFrom function has an integer overflow in the calculation of _value * _to.balance due to a lack of proper validation.
